title: Mango, coconut and passion fruit yogurt

ingredients.item: 2 large, ripe mangoes, peeled and cubed

instructions.step: Whizz the mango in a food processor to form a thick purée. Gently stir together the purée, yogurt and coconut. Chill until ready to serve.
Spoon into six small glasses and top with the passion fruit seeds and pulp.
